items.title: Chess Training - From Novice to Intermediate Level

visible_instructors.name: Michael
visible_instructors.job_title: Technology Consultant and Chess Instructor and Passionate
visible_instructors.title: Michael Khadra

items.headline: Step by step approach for Chess learning, blending the theory with practice for best results
objectives_summary: Understand the Chess game rules
Understand Chess Game Phases (Opening, Middlegame, Endgame)
Play chess with ease against beginner and intermediate players (1000-1400 ELO)

items.title: The Ultimate Guide to Chess Pawn Structures
items.headline: Master the essential pawn structures with instructive examples from the World chess champions
objectives_summary: Be able to recognise effective plans in different openings and their pawn structures e.g. Minority attack plan in Carlsbad structure of Queens Gambit
Be able to build an effective opening repertoire which fits your playing style e.g. Nimzo-indian for prophylaxis style
Be able to use pawn structures to influence the level of tactics one needs to calculate - e.g. Slav or French structures can be used for quieter positions

items.title: Learn How to Compete with the top 5% of Fortnite Players

objectives_summary: Have the tools to compete with the best Fortnite players in the world
Outplay 90% of your opponents

items.title: Chess for Beginners
items.headline: The course is created with the intent of enabling an absolute beginner to learn the game in a very structured manner
objectives_summary: Learn the basics of the game in structured manner.
Focus of developing a method of thinking in the beginner. Give the right beginning to your young genius.
Pace yourself at your own comfort level.

items.title: A fun lovers Guide to the Major Chess Openings
items.headline: Find chess openings that are right for your personality, goals and interests and chess improvement needs generally
objectives_summary: The ability to use guiding rules and principles to play any opening to a good standard and follow art of war philosphy
The ability to experience the personality and style of different openings from important instructive examples
The ability to get familiarised with the basic plans of many different named openings and variations
